Package com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathfinding.grid

Interface NavigationGridGraph<T extends NavigationGridGraphNode>

Type Parameters:
T - only classes implementing NavigationGridGraphNode can be used within this graph
All Superinterfaces:
NavigationGraph<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
NavigationGrid, NavigationTiledMapLayer
public interface NavigationGridGraph<T extends NavigationGridGraphNode> extends NavigationGraph<T>
A NavigationGraph which is represented as a grid or a table. The nodes are accessible through (x, y) coordinates.

The default implementation is GridCell.

    • contains

      boolean contains (int x, int y)
      Determine wether the given x,y pair is within the bounds of this grid
      Parameters:
      x - - The x / column coordinate of the node.
      y - - The y / row coordinate of the node.
      Returns:
      true if the (x,y) is within the boundaries of this grid

    • setWalkable

      void setWalkable (int x, int y, boolean walkable)
      Set whether the node on the given position is walkable.
      Parameters:
      x - - The x / column coordinate of the node.
      y - - The y / row coordinate of the node.
      walkable - - Whether the position is walkable.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinate is not inside the grid.

    • isWalkable

      boolean isWalkable (int x, int y)
      Determine whether the node at the given position is walkable.
      Parameters:
      x - - The x / column coordinate of the node.
      y - - The y / row coordinate of the node.
      Returns:
      true if the node at [x,y] is walkable, false if it is not walkable (or if [x,y] is not within the grid's limit)
